price: Nanso wͻmfa ntu wͻn ho fo, gyesε Nyankopͻn pε; Ɔno ne Obi a εsεsε yɛsuro no, na yεyε Ne ho ahwεyie, na Ɔno ne Obi a Ɔde bͻne kyε.
arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā yadhkurūna illā an yashāa al-lahu huwa ahlu al-taqwā wa-ahlu al-maghfirati
